cause.description:
If you have any sympathy whatsoever towards God's living creatures, and it pains you to see innocent animals face hostility in this growing world, join this group.
www.badgerbadgerbadger.com
1. Badgers have the right to live peacefully.
2. Everyone should love badgers.
3. You should join this cause, and save badgers.
cause.mission: Help stop the growing hostiity towards badgers!
cause.name: Save Badgers!
